00020 #pragma once
00021 
00022 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00023 #include <l4/re/dataspace>
00024 #include <l4/re/video/colors>
00025 
00026 namespace L4Re { namespace Video {
00027 
00028 class Goos;
00029 
00034 class L4_EXPORT View
00035 {
00036 private:
00037   friend class Goos;
00038 
00039   L4::Cap<Goos> _goos;
00040   unsigned _view_idx;
00041 
00042   View(l4_cap_idx_t goos, unsigned idx) : _goos(goos), _view_idx(idx) {}
00043 
00044   unsigned view_index() const throw()
00045   { return _goos.is_valid() ? _view_idx : ~0U; }
00046 
00047 public:
00048   View() : _goos(L4::Cap<Goos>::Invalid) {}
00049 
00053   enum Flags
00054   {
00055     F_none               = 0x00, 
00056     F_set_buffer         = 0x01, 
00057     F_set_buffer_offset  = 0x02, 
00058     F_set_bytes_per_line = 0x04, 
00059     F_set_pixel          = 0x08, 
00060     F_set_position       = 0x10, 
00061     F_dyn_allocated      = 0x20, 
00062     F_set_background     = 0x40, 
00063     F_set_flags          = 0x80, 
00064 
00066     F_fully_dynamic      =   F_set_buffer | F_set_buffer_offset | F_set_bytes_per_line
00067                            | F_set_pixel | F_set_position | F_dyn_allocated,
00068   };
00069 
00076   enum V_flags
00077   {
00078     F_above              = 0x1000,  
00079     F_flags_mask         = 0xff000, 
00080   };
00081 
00085   struct Info
00086   {
00087     unsigned flags;                 
00088     unsigned view_index;            
00089 
00090     unsigned long xpos;             
00091     unsigned long ypos;             
00092     unsigned long width;            
00093     unsigned long height;           
00094     unsigned long buffer_offset;    
00095     unsigned long bytes_per_line;   
00096     Pixel_info pixel_info;          
00097     unsigned buffer_index;          
00098 
00100     bool has_static_buffer() const { return !(flags & F_set_buffer); }
00102     bool has_static_buffer_offset() const { return !(flags & F_set_buffer_offset); }
00103 
00105     bool has_set_buffer() const { return flags & F_set_buffer; }
00107     bool has_set_buffer_offset() const { return flags & F_set_buffer_offset; }
00109     bool has_set_bytes_per_line() const { return flags & F_set_bytes_per_line; }
00111     bool has_set_pixel() const { return flags & F_set_pixel; }
00113     bool has_set_position() const { return flags & F_set_position; }
00114 
00116     template< typename STREAM >
00117     STREAM &dump(STREAM &s) const
00118     {
00119       s << "View::Info:" << '\n'
00120         << "  flags: " << flags << '\n'
00121         << "  size:  " << (int)width << 'x' << (int)height
00122         << "  pos: " << (int)xpos << ", " << (int)ypos << '\n'
00123         << "  bytes_per_line: " << bytes_per_line << '\n'
00124         << "  buffer_offset:  " << buffer_offset << '\n'
00125         << "  ";
00126       pixel_info.dump(s) << '\n';
00127       return s;
00128     }
00129   };
00130 
00136   int info(Info *info) const throw();
00137 
00146   int set_info(Info const &info) const throw();
00147 
00157   int set_viewport(int scr_x, int scr_y, int w, int h, unsigned long buf_offset) const throw();
00158 
00166   int stack(View const &pivot, bool behind = true) const throw();
00167 
00169   int push_top() const throw()
00170   { return stack(View(), true); }
00171 
00173   int push_bottom() const throw()
00174   { return stack(View(), false); }
00175 
00184   int refresh(int x, int y, int w, int h) const throw();
00185 
00187   bool valid() const { return _goos.is_valid(); }
00188 };
00189 
00190 }}
